mapper.insert: /* insertRecruitUser 면접 합격시 프로젝트 유저로 등록 */ insert into project_user(user_sn, prjct_sn, role_sn, mber_sn, start_date) values(PRJCTUSER_SEQ.nextval, (select prjct_sn from recruit where pblanc_sn = (select pblanc_sn from recruit_apply where pblanc_sport_sn = #{pblanc_sport_sn})), (select role_sn from user_roll a, recruit b, recruit_apply c where a.prjct_sn = b.prjct_sn and b.pblanc_sn = c.pblanc_sn and c.pblanc_sport_sn = #{pblanc_sport_sn} and (case when c.pblanc_sport_role = 0 then 'DA' when c.pblanc_sport_role = 1 then 'AA' when c.pblanc_sport_role = 2 then 'TA' when c.pblanc_sport_role = 3 then 'UA' end) = a.role_nm), (select pblanc_sport_man_sn from recruit_apply where pblanc_sport_sn = #{pblanc_sport_sn}), to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
